value.string:
"""
 This script creates or updates sale order lines based on the fast 
 input information.It should take into account any sale order line 
 which were already created so that they are not duplicated.
 """
 from Products.ERP5Type.Message import translateString
 from Products.ERP5Type.Log import log
 result_list = []
 sale_order_line_list = context.contentValues(portal_type='Sale Order Line')
 if sale_order_line_list!=[]:
 sale_order_line_id_list = [x.getId() for x in sale_order_line_list]
 for line in listbox:
 #for each line in listbox if line has a reference defined, search 
 #for the product whose reference has been entered
 if line.has_key('listbox_key') and line['title'] not in ('', None):
 line_id = line['listbox_key']
 product = context.portal_catalog.getResultValue(
 portal_type=['Product','Service'],
 title=line['title'],
 reference=line['reference'])
 
 #for each sale order line already added,
 #if the line's id is the same as the sale order line, update it
 for sale_order_line in sale_order_line_list:
 if sale_order_line.getId()==line_id:
 sale_order_line.edit(start_date=context.getStartDate(),
 stop_date=context.getStopDate(),
 resource_title=product.getTitle(),
 price_currency = context.getPriceCurrency(),
 quantity = line["quantity"],
 quantity_unit = product.getQuantityUnit(),)
 sale_order_line.setResourceValue(product)
 if line["variation_category_list"]!='':
 sale_order_line.setVariationCategoryList(['variation/%s'%line["variation_category_list"]])
 base_id = 'movement'
 cell_key_list = list(sale_order_line.getCellKeyList(base_id=base_id))
 cell_key_list.sort()
 price = line['total_price']/line['quantity']
 quantity = line['quantity']
 for cell_key in cell_key_list:
 cell = sale_order_line.newCell(base_id=base_id, \
 portal_type='Sale Order Cell', *cell_key)
 cell.edit(mapped_value_property_list=['price','quantity'],
 price=price, quantity=quantity,
 predicate_category_list=cell_key,
 variation_category_list=cell_key)
 price += 1
 quantity += 1
 result_list.append(sale_order_line)
 else:
 # if there was no sale order line already defined
 # for the sale order, add a new sale order line
 log("it goes in here second")
 if len(sale_order_line_list)==0 or line_id not in sale_order_line_id_list:
 sale_order_line= context.newContent(
 portal_type='Sale Order Line',)
 sale_order_line.setResourceValue(product)
 
 sale_order_line.edit(
 start_date=context.getStartDate(),
 stop_date=context.getStopDate(),
 resource_title=product.getTitle(),
 price_currency = context.getPriceCurrency(),
 quantity = line["quantity"],
 )
 if line["variation_category_list"]!='':
 sale_order_line.setVariationCategoryList(['variation/%s'%line["variation_category_list"]])
 base_id = 'movement'
 cell_key_list = list(sale_order_line.getCellKeyList(base_id=base_id))
 cell_key_list.sort()
 price = line['total_price']/line['quantity']
 quantity = line['quantity']
 for cell_key in cell_key_list:
 cell = sale_order_line.newCell(base_id=base_id, \
 portal_type='Sale Order Cell', *cell_key)
 cell.edit(mapped_value_property_list=['price','quantity'],
 price=price, quantity=quantity,
 predicate_category_list=cell_key,
 variation_category_list=cell_key)
 price += 1
 quantity += 1
 result_list.append(sale_order_line)
 
 
 #return to the feature module
 return context.Base_redirect(form_id, keep_items=dict(
 portal_status_message=translateString('Sale Order Lines Created.')))
